item.description:
OUR GROUP'S PURPOSE

Play volleyball in the Boston area, and meet other volleyball players.

We play outdoors in the warmer months on both sand and grass, and indoors during the winter months in various locations.

For more information about the group, please read the posts in the "Boston Volleyball Group Information" forum in the Message Board section.

If you are looking for people for a team, or are looking to join a team, see the "Player Requests" forum in the Message Board section. Note that you can only see this forum if you are a member of the group.
item.name: Boston Volleyball Group
